keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: A tasty and filling vegetarian meal.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large pan. Add the onion and garlic. Fry gently for 4-5 min. Add the dried chillies. Stir in the paprika, tomato puree, bay leaves and cinnamon stick. Cook for 2 min.

Stir in the prepared vegetables, measured water, beans and tomatoes. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for 50-60 min until vegetables are just tender. Stir in half the chopped coriander. Discard the cinnamon stick.

Meanwhile, warm the tortillas according to pack instructions. Divide the vegetable mixture between the tortillas. Add a littled soured cream or yogurt and the grated cheese. Sprinkle over remaining chopped coriander.

title: Mixed chilli bean tortilla
